### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️ ## Modify Block Placed --- [Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_block_placed) Modifies the placed block upon placing one. Type ID: `apugli:modify_block_placed` --- ### Examples ```json { "type": "apugli:modify_block_placed", "blocks": [ "minecraft:white_wool", "minecraft:orange_wool", "minecraft:magenta_wool", "minecraft:light_blue_wool", "minecraft:yellow_wool", "minecraft:lime_wool", "minecraft:pink_wool", "minecraft:gray_wool", "minecraft:light_gray_wool", "minecraft:cyan_wool", "minecraft:purple_wool", "minecraft:blue_wool", "minecraft:brown_wool", "minecraft:green_wool", "minecraft:red_wool", "minecraft:black_wool" ], "item_condition": { "type": "apoli:ingredient", "ingredient": { "tag": "minecraft:wool" } } } ``` This example will randomly replace the color of the Wool block that you place.
```json { "type": "apugli:modify_block_placed", "block_states": [ "minecraft:chest[facing=north]", "minecraft:chest[facing=south]", "minecraft:chest[facing=east]", "minecraft:chest[facing=west]" ], "item_condition": { "type": "apoli:ingredient", "ingredient": { "item": "minecraft:chest" } } } ``` This example will randomly "rotate" the Chest block that you place.
